input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to get featured on ifunny?
input_text.Response A: There are a few things you can do to increase your chances of being featured on ifunny. First, make sure that your posts are high-quality and original. Second, try to post at times when there are a lot of people online. Third, be active in the ifunny community and engage with other users. Finally, don't be afraid to promote your posts!
input_text.Response B: Getting featured on ifunny is a difficult process, as the ifunny team receives a high volume of submissions every day.  To get featured, your content must be of a high quality and be relevant to a wide audience.  You should ensure that your content is well written, original, and entertaining, and you should also promote your content on social media to try to get it in front of as many people as possible.  Getting featured on ifunny can help to increase your profile and reach a wider audience, so it’s worth putting in the effort to try to get featured.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Some grammatical mistakes in option A (Second should be Secondly)
